name: Cyber Dominance EEG BMI BCI VR MR MilTech Cybersecurity Training
name_original: Cyber Dominance EEG BMI BCI VR MR MilTech Cybersecurity Training
description:
Cyber Dominance 

EEG BMI BCI AI ML VR MR MilTech Cybersecurity Training and PTSD / Soldier Peak Performance Training Simulation Game. 

A Fun Gaming Simulation where Armed Forces Soldiers wear 2 EEG Brain Machine Interface Noninvasive Real-Time Headsets and Trigger Game Actions with their Visual Cortex Focus and Motor Imagery Training.

First Prototype Hardware and Software EEG BMI BCI Headset the user focuses on Real-Time Visual Cortex and Eye Targeting a 3D Object with Neurotrigger target. Target triggers Visual Action with UI teaching training on Current Critical Cybersecurity Threat. Additional future components will build on this for All branches of Armed forces including Space Force, et al. 

Second Prototype Hardware and Software EEG BMI BCI Headset utilizing Real-Time Brainwave EEG Data Visualization on Encrypted Private Cloud Server 

The user puts the second EEG headset above the first one and they are used simultaneously. I have created a Motor Imagery Training the pinky and visualization screens for: Real-Time Brainwave EEG Data, Motor Imagery Training and Confidence. Focus and Calm Visualization Training on Cloud Visualization Platform. 

The user will focus on the line graph or circle and think of being Calm and or Focused and the Pinky Motor Imagery Triggers any extra trigger. They get real-time feedback on being more calm and focus and this is timeline calendar graphed like Github. I have also connected the Spotify API and can do Peak Performance and PTSD training where the brainwaves are recorded and analyzed in Real-time and that feeds to the Spotify recommendation system to feed music that will make them feel better and perform better.  Additional future components will build on this for All branches of Armed forces including Space Force and Veterans, et al. 

Team Credits Co -Creators Developers

Kendra Kennedy and Cliff Baldridge

Concept: Cliff Baldridge

Kendra's Role

Software Engineering and Development, Troubleshooting, Unity, SDK Integration,  VR Developer, Interactions Engineer, UI Design Animation Particle Physics and Level builder.

Cliff's Role

Project Manager, 3D Content, Execution on EEG Devices Successfully. 
Software Engineering and Development, Troubleshooting, Unity, SDK Integration
